milestones.description: Jayasuriya has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (375), going past Tendulkar

stories.title: Rain ruins series decider
stories.subTitle: New Zealand v Sri Lanka, 5th ODI, Hamilton
stories.summary: Rain ruined the deciding ODI between New Zealand and Sri Lanka as the match was abandoned without a ball being bowled

stories.title: Cricket returns to Hamilton with series up for grabs
stories.subTitle: New Zealand v Sri Lanka, 5th ODI, Hamilton
stories.seoTitle: Cricket returns to Hamilton with series up for grabs
stories.summary: International cricket returns to Hamilton's Seddon Park with the five-match series between New Zealand and Sri Lanka evenly poised at 2-2

stories.title: Fleming dismisses rotation blame
stories.subTitle: Sri Lanka in New Zealand, 2006-07
stories.summary: Stephen Fleming, New Zealand's captain, has dismissed the rotation policy as a reason for his side's crushing defeat at the hands of Sri Lanka on Saturday
